_Barrry_ is an American dark comedy-crime television series created by Alec Berg and Bill Hader that premiered on HBO. It stars Hader as the titular character, a hitman from the Midwest who travels to Los Angeles to kill someone and then finds himself joining an acting class taught by Henry Winkler's character.

![Barry Show Logo](barry_logo.jpg)

Here is a summary of some basic statistics on viewership:

```{r}
library(tidyverse)

barry_data <- tribble(
  ~episode, ~season, ~title, ~director, ~writer, ~air_date, ~viewers_millions,
  1, 1, "Chapter One: Make Your Mark", "Bill Hader", "Alec Berg & Bill Hader", "2018-03-25", 0.564,
  2, 2, "Chapter Two: Use It", "Bill Hader", "Alec Berg & Bill Hader", "2018-04-01", 0.641,
  # ... Add all remaining rows from the provided table ...
)

barry_summary <- barry_data %>%
  group_by(season) %>%
  summarise(avg_viewers = mean(viewers_millions))

barry_summary
